subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Tears shed on the sideline after a touchdown catch. A vague statement after the game, and then not answering any questions. Terrell Owens realizes those incidents have raised speculation about his “mental state of mind.” Owens, the Dallas Cowboys’ star receiver, insisted there was nothing to worry about. “Last week I was going through a lot of stuff, and the previous week,” Owens said. “Other than that, dude, I’m in good spirits. I’m fine.”.
